scripts.start: run-s clean src:copy contracts:deploy contracts:copy && NODE_ENV=development electron-forge start
scripts.start:matic_testnet: run-s clean src:copy contracts:deploy:matic_testnet contracts:copy:matic_testnet && NODE_ENV=development electron-forge start
scripts.dev: run-s src:copy contracts:build contracts:copy:matic_testnet && NODE_ENV=development electron-forge start
scripts.dev:mock: run-s src:copy contracts:build contracts:copy:matic_testnet && NODE_ENV=development electron-forge start -- mock
scripts.contracts:copy: mkdir -p src/abis && cp ../blockchain/deployments/localhost/TurnBasedGame*.json ./src/abis/ && cp ../blockchain/deployments/localhost/Poker*.json ./src/abis/ && cp ../blockchain/descartes-env/deployments/localhost/Descartes.json ./src/abis/ && cp ../blockchain/descartes-env/deployments/localhost/Logger.json ./src/abis/ && ncp ../blockchain/src/types/ ./src/types/
scripts.contracts:copy:matic_testnet: mkdir -p src/abis && cp ../blockchain/deployments/matic_testnet/TurnBasedGame*.json ./src/abis/ && cp ../blockchain/deployments/matic_testnet/Poker*.json ./src/abis/ && cp ../node_modules/@cartesi/descartes-sdk/deployments/matic_testnet/Descartes.json ./src/abis/ && cp ../node_modules/@cartesi/logger/deployments/matic_testnet/Logger.json ./src/abis/ && ncp ../blockchain/src/types/ ./src/types/
scripts.package: run-s clean src:copy contracts:copy && rimraf out && electron-forge package
